about_the_game:
Update on the Grand Strategy SSB (大戦略SSB) Steam release
----------------------------------------------------------------
Regarding the postponed release, Steam has identified some content that may be unacceptable in some markets and it is taking time to review the content.
We have made corrections to content that seemed to be sensitive topics and submitted them for review by Steam in June, 2022. However, Steam has yet to contact us to confirm the review has been completed.

Thank you for your continued interest in our games.

Game mode

Daisenryaku SSB has a scenario mode with enemy and ally units on the map, and a free mode where you can change the settings of the map without the initial units!

Scenario mode

Includes 5 scenarios created from the latest international situation! Protect Japan's future

List of scenarios


■台湾危機
Battle between China and Taiwan.

■朝鮮半島の赤化統一
Battle between the Korean Reunification Army and the Peacekeeping Army.

■尖閣奪還
Battle between the Self-Defense Forces and the Chinese army.

■アイヌ独立
A three-way battle between Japan, China and Russia.

■米国内戦
Battle between the US regular army and the rebels.

Free mode

You can play the same map as many times as you like by freely changing the settings such as military funds at the start of the map.
In the production type, you can edit the list of weapons produced by each camp.

short_description: "Daisenryaku SSB" is a simulation game in which you command and fight troops such as tanks and fighters on a battlefield separated by hexes. Since the birth of the "Daisenryaku" series, AI has been tough, and it has been evaluated as a simple game but deep game.
